title: V2 API _introspect should point to the new reference guide
description: It would be nice if we can point to the specific version of the documentation for this particular version of Solr

comments.content:
I assigned this to myself & then thought better of it because while I could update all the links in specs to point to a generic URL for documentation that would redirect to the latest version, I don't know how to modify the specs themselves to dynamically insert the proper version (at build time I guess?) so the links point to the right version of docs.

If we're OK with these links going to a generic URL that will always take the user to the latest docs, I can do that.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett

comments.content: I think pointing to the latest version is already an improvement to what we have now. Pointing to the specific version of the code is a nice thing to have in my opinion, but should not block the change.
comments.author: Tomás Fernández Löbbe

comments.content:
OK, I'll work on that for now then.

I may take the opportunity to update all remaining "cwiki.apache.org" URLs everywhere - I count about 150 of them still hanging around various places...I'll start with these specs though.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
